WRITING.TEXT: lol im 12. but that does hit me a bit hard... I'm always trying to find a new way to get high. it went from inhalants, to alcohol and laughing gas, and now ambien and dxm.
im not a punk kid. I do well in school. I keep my shit together. I'm just looking for an escape from my meaningless fucking existence for however long I can.
by the way, this is my alt account

relatively similar situation, but not with drugs. my parents havent found out about the drug use yet ( #865; #176; #860; #662; #865; #176;) my parents had found out that I was cutting myself around 5 months ago. my parents severely overreacted. they tried to cut off access to my friends (they thought it was their fault. it wasn't at all .) and took me to the hospital, and searched my room for blades, etc. this was in the beginning of 7th grade. i feel kinda the same way, except with cutting and not weed.
lol ive gone 60 hours without sleep. started hallucinating, but after around 20 hrs of sleep later ur fine
im 12 lmfao
that moment when ur 12
just get a whipped cream can. thats the only thing i have access to at my age, but it works great. bit expensive though.
o o f
b o r r o w. ill totally give it bacc lmao

idk. i went the 60 hours of sleep without any stimulants actually. (not even caffeine) so if I was getting to dangerous levels of sleep deprivation, my brain would force me to sleep. when your on speed, or coke, or whatever drug your taking to stay awake that long, it may be different. some studies show that over 72 hours without sleep can cause brain damage, so don't do that. 40 hrs would definitely reset your circadian rhythm, but thats not a huge deal. I think if you don't do it all the time, you'll be fine. (no more than once every 2 weeks or so)
eyes dialating just causes you to see more light...

WRITING.TITLE: ambien way stronger than I thought
WRITING.TEXT: I was looking into a normal dose for someone with low tolerance, and someone told me to take 20 mg. I thought this was a bit high (pun definitely intended) so I ended up taking a starting dose of 7.5mg. holy FUCK I am glad that I did that. I was trippin balls at just 7.5mg. I was hallucinating for 45 mins to an hour after the comeup, and afterward I had a really nice relaxed and unwinded feeling for an hour. is this just because I have low tolerance and haven't done ambien before? idk...
im 12 lmao

fuckin 80's ish battle scene on the wall like it was a projector, the walls were breathing, field of view increasing and decreasing, and sensation of shooting backwards, tiles coming off the wall and rearranging. thats all I can remember, but I'm sure it was way more stuff. shit it was weird.
yeah. i underestimated it big time.
smoke fentanyl? didnt know u could do that
bruh why r u on this sub. go to r/Christianity or something
iTs a ViTaMiN bRo. let ur students take their "vitamins"
i hope this is ironic...
lmao im 12 and do hallucinogens on occasion
I have super low blood pressure and this happens to me all the fuckin time. i usually remember what happened few mins later.
i do my fuccin research... you never know what something will do to you...
big relatable
i didnt need to try really. it didnt make me need to sleep
he looks like a phineus and ferb character
u g a i

WRITING.TITLE: haha kill me plz
WRITING.TEXT: something happened today that made me want to fuckin die so, I was already annoyed at this person because she had told the school counselor about my self harm a couple weeks prior. (even though my parents already knew.) so, I was just in my ELA class talking to some friends, and as I was walking back to my desk, she tells me to come over, and I do. she says "guess what I stole from the astronomy teacher" and I'm like "okay what" and she shows me a fucking scalpel. I was a bit worried for her, because she is an ex-self harmer. and she says "it's okay I'm not gonna use it" but my main problem is that it fucking triggered me. bad. I was 2 weeks clean at that point, and I just said "you don't need to fucking show this to me" and go back to my desk. I ended up taking the blade right out of my pencil sharpener and relapse right there in the middle of class. at the end of class she comes over and says "is it still your sad boi hour" in a condescending voice. a minute later she notices that i'm limping and says "OP what did you do!" and I said point blank "I cut my thigh because of the scalpel you showed me." then she says "it's not my fault! you're responsible for your own feelings." I stormed off, and haven't spoke to her since. this person has been toxic in the past, and I'm considering dropping ties but we have so many mutual friends that it'd be tough. also, my crush is very good friends with her. I just needed to get this off my chest. thanks guys. edit:totally open to conversation if ya'll have similar stories
10 mg ambien.
oof I do drugs at 12 and have been for a while
